notes:
Czech models for MorphoDiTa, providing morphological analysis, morphological generation and part-of-speech tagging.

The morphological dictionary is created from MorfFlex CZ 161115 and DeriNet 1.2 and the PoS tagger is trained on Prague Dependency Treebank 3.0 (PDT).
title: Czech Models (MorfFlex CZ 161115 + PDT 3.0) for MorphoDiTa 161115
